resources.string: This setting is only available after unhiding
Grant Amarok access to external storage to hide files.
Storage permission denied. File-hiding is unavailable
App-hiding unavailable. Check \"More Settings\" → \"Switch app-hiding mode\".
Hunting alone in the starless night.
Send anonymous crash reports to the developers for analysis.
Restart the app to apply the new changes.
Displays information to help troubleshoot issues.
DSM: Invalid DSM provider. Have you installed and activated the DSM provider on your device?
Could not hide app: DSM provider not active.

Hints for folder selector: 
	 1. Click "Use This Folder" to select the folder
	 2. Always select a file on the device 
	(Slide from the right of the screen to open local files)
Please ensure it is local file and not a virtual one.
Please select app-hiding mode in \"More settings\".
Check for new versions on startup.
Amarok %s (%d) is available to download and install.
You are running the latest version.
Version %s is now available for update.
Caution: Ensure the what you select manually actually exists, as this is not validated.
Unsupported Shizuku version: Pre-v11. Please install Shizuku v11 or later.
Shizuku: Service unavailable. Have you installed Shizuku/Sui on your device?
Could not hide app: Could not access IPackageManager API.
App-hiding with root access.\nRecommended if your device is rooted, but lacks the Xposed framework. Root permission is required.
App-hiding with Shizuku (or Sui). \nRecommended if your device runs Android 11+ or has the Xposed framework. Installed and active Shizuku or Sui required.\n

App-hiding with Delegated-Scopes-Manager.\nNot recommended unless your device runs Android 10 or earlier and is not rooted. May be buggy and work unexpectedly. Installed Icebox (or StopAPP) set as device owner required.
Makes the filename human-unreadable. Basic file-hiding feature that cannot be turned off.
Obfuscates the file signature in the file header to make the file appear corrupted. Prevents the file from being opened manually with \"Open With\", but may slow down the hiding process.
Obfuscating file headers has no effect on text files. Enabling this function will fully obfuscate text files.
Not recommended. An enhanced version of \"Fully obfuscate text files\". Use this option only if the standard method proves ineffective. Significantly slows down the hiding process.
Permission to display over other apps denied.
Permission to spawn pop-up windows required
The floating button needs permission to spawn pop-up windows. Please grant this permission in the settings menu under Amarok.
Displays a floating button to quickly hide apps and files in an emergency. This button appears over all other apps when Amarok is unhidden.
New version available, but download failed. Please update manually.
Could not open the system file picker
Oops! Your system lacks a default file manager. Please long-press the \"Add Hidden Folder\" button and manually input the path.
Displays a persistent notification to notify users when not hidden.
The QuickHide service needs notification permission to function.
Your privacy is not hidden. Click to hide.
Password must be between 3 and 15 characters.
Use the device\'s biometric authentication to access Amarok, when available.
Dhizuku: Unsupported Dhizuku version. Please update Dhizuku to version 5 or higher.
Dhizuku: Service unavailable. Please ensure that you have installed and activated Dhizuku.
App-hiding with Dhizuku.\nA modern and improved solution for hiding apps on non-rooted devices. Installation and activation of the Dhizuku app are required.
Try to restore everything. Use this option only when you run into troubles.
Try to restore everything?\n\nWARNING: This option may corrupt your files. Only use it when you encounter trouble and cannot perform the \"unhide\" function normally.
Executing force unhide. Please sit tight.
Language / 语言 / Langue / Sprache / 言語
Help us translate Amarok into your language.
Disguise Amarok as a calendar app.
Hide Amarok from the launcher. Dial *#*#262765#*#* to open the Amarok.
Disable disguise and app lock when not hidden.
Long press the Year Number to access Amarok.
Obfuscate filenames and file signatures. No root access required. May take some time to process.
Change file permissions to make them unreadable. Root access required. The procedure is immediate.
Simply adds .nomedia to folders. No root access required.

Amarok is a free and freedom tool for hiding private files & applications.

Please note that Amarok is not an encryption software, but rather a tool for hiding things. We strongly advise against using Amarok to protect confidential files and applications.

Disclaimers: Amarok is provided without any warranties or conditions. The user is fully responsible for any harm or consequences that may arise from using Amarok.
Some Samsung users have reported that using ChmodFileHider caused their devices to fail to boot. Refer to GitHub issue #105 for more information. Use at your own risk.
Automatically hides after the screen turns off.
The number of minutes to delay before hiding after the screen turns off.
Block screenshots in Amarok and blur it in the recent apps list.
Enable Amarok to hide applications from system menus.
Utilizing Xposed to enhance app hiding. Hidden apps will no longer be visible in settings or other apps. Xposed API ≥ 93 required.
Only disable apps and let XHide handle the hiding exclusively. May reduce lag during the hiding.
Do not show toast notifications during hide or unhide actions.
Activate an app hiding mode to enable this feature.
By default, the quick settings tile appears activated when your privacy is visible. Toggle this option to reverse the behavior.
Hiding system apps may cause system bootloop. Please be cautious when hiding system apps.
Amarok is not designed for hiding root-related apps. It may cause root access loss. Consider using Dr-TSNG/Hide-My-Applist instead.
Dhizuku: Failed to grant `DELEGATION_PACKAGE_ACCESS`. Please try reactivating Dhizuku.
Hide Amarok from the recent apps screen.
This option will hide Amarok from the launcher. You can dial *#*#262765#*#* (262765 spells \"amarok\" on T9 keypad) to access Amarok again.
